t: What are your alternatives to big name brands, like Amazon? - Bogleheads.org
s: I find it hard to cut Amazon/Walmart/Target/Costco/Home Depot/Best Buy out entirely, because they're so entrenched in American life and really do tend to offer the best deals on common items. However, where I tend to find better alternatives are in specific niche categories like hobby-centric retailers. Some good examples would be Newegg for PC components, or Miniature Market for tabletop gaming. I'm sure there are similar ...
